SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ConstructiveExperiment
Experiment that benchmarks different algorithms among them.
DropNeighborhood
Neighborhood that explores removing a single set from the solution.
DropNeighborhood.DropMove
Represents a move that removes a single set from the solution.
ExampleAlgorithm
Example of a custom algorithm that executes a constructive followed by a sequence of improve -> shake --> improve This algorithm can be used instead of one provided by the framework, such as VNS.
ExamplePSSCShake
Shake: add a random unselected set, then drop any newly redundant sets.
Main
 
PSSCAddShake
A Shake component that perturbs a solution by adding 'k' random, unselected sets.
PSSCBaseMove
Base move class for all moves in the PSSC problem.
PSSCGRASPConstructive
An efficient GRASP (Greedy Randomized Adaptive Search Procedure) constructive for the PSCP.
PSSCGreedyConstructive
An efficient greedy constructive for the PSCP.
PSSCInstance
 
PSSCInstanceImporter
Loads ORâ€‘Library SCP / PSCP instances.
PSSCRandomConstructive
Create a random solution for the PSCP: Partial Set Covering Problem
PSSCReferenceResults
Loads sota results from a CSV file to comapre automatically against their algorithm.
PSSCSolution
 
PSSCSolutionExporter
Export Covering Set solutions to an easy-to-understand text format.
PSSCSolutionExporter.PSSCSolutionExporterConfig
 
PSSCSolutionValidator
Validate that a solution is valid for the PSSC problem.
PSSCVariableNeighborhoodDescent
Implements a Variable Neighborhood Search (VNS) algorithm for the Partial Set Covering Problem.
ShakeDestroyAndRepair
A powerful Shake component for the VNS algorithm that implements a "Destroy and Repair" strategy.
Swap11Neighborhood
Implements a (1,1)-Swap neighborhood for the Maximum Set k-Covering Problem (MSKCP).
Swap11Neighborhood.Swap11Move
Represents a move that swaps one set in the solution for another.
Swap22Neighborhood
Implements a (2,2)-Swap neighborhood for the Maximum Set k-Covering Problem (MSKCP).
Swap22Neighborhood.Swap22Move
Represents a move that swaps two sets in the solution for two others.
SwapAndDropNeighborhood
A powerful composite neighborhood that explores a (1,1)-Swap followed immediately by a Drop.
SwapAndDropNeighborhood.SwapAndDropMove
Represents a single composite move: Swap one set, then Drop another.
SwapNeighborhood
Neighborhood that explores swapping one set from the solution with one set not in the solution.
SwapNeighborhood.SwapMove
Represents a move that swaps one set in the solution for another.
VnsPscp
Implements a powerful Variable Neighborhood Search for the Partial Set Covering Problem (VNS-PSCP).
